Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Siarra has Ease??
By Sharp Gambit on Monday, December 5, 2005 - 01:29 am:

Sorry for bothering you, Lisa, but in Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Tourney Opponents and Their Stats, Siarra, a Daina (Pixie/Dragon) has Ease. It used it on my Wracky as Dagmir missed 5 times with air shot, then hit it with head spike. (GOOD JOB DAGMIR!!!)

However, I have saw Siarra use Ease, and I am wondering whether you can edit the post to fit it in Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Tourney Opponents and Their Stats. Thank you and I hope this is not an infraction.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, December 5, 2005 - 11:47 am:
